subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Aliona Savchenko and Robin Szolkowy of Germany won the pairs title at the world figure skating championships in Goteborg, Sweden. Savchenko and Szolkowy, also the Grand Prix and European champions, took advantage of their hugely difficult routine to win the title, beating China’s Zhang Dan and Zhang Hao by more than 5 points.
